channel.title: CVE Feed for Moxa -- SDS-3008 Series Industrial Ethernet Switch
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Moxa -- SDS-3008 Series Industrial Ethernet Switch

item.title: CVE-2022-41311|2024-08-03T12:42:45.920Z -- moxa -- sds-3008%20series%20industrial%20ethernet%20switch
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the web application functionality of Moxa SDS-3008 Series Industrial Ethernet Switch 2.1. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary Javascript execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.Form field id="webLocationMessage_text" name="webLocationMessage_text"

item.title: CVE-2022-40224|2024-08-03T12:14:40.040Z -- moxa -- sds-3008%20series%20industrial%20ethernet%20switch
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa SDS-3008 Series Industrial Ethernet Switch 2.1. A specially-crafted HTTP message header can lead to denial of service. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-41312|2024-08-03T12:42:44.840Z -- moxa -- sds-3008%20series%20industrial%20ethernet%20switch
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the web application functionality of Moxa SDS-3008 Series Industrial Ethernet Switch 2.1. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary Javascript execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.Form field id="Switch Description", name "switch_description"

item.title: CVE-2022-40691|2024-08-03T12:21:46.623Z -- moxa -- sds-3008%20series%20industrial%20ethernet%20switch
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the web application functionality of Moxa SDS-3008 Series Industrial Ethernet Switch 2.1. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to a disclosure of sensitive information. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-41313|2024-08-03T12:42:44.647Z -- moxa -- sds-3008%20series%20industrial%20ethernet%20switch
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the web application functionality of Moxa SDS-3008 Series Industrial Ethernet Switch 2.1. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary Javascript execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.Form field id="switch_contact"

item.title: CVE-2022-40693|2024-08-03T12:21:46.601Z -- moxa -- sds-3008%20series%20industrial%20ethernet%20switch
item.description: A cleartext transmission vulnerability exists in the web application functionality of Moxa SDS-3008 Series Industrial Ethernet Switch 2.1. A specially-crafted network sniffing can lead to a disclosure of sensitive information. An attacker can sniff network traffic to trigger this vulnerability.
